mapper.select: SELECT room_no , room_name , mem_id , mem_name , TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS reg_date , del_yn FROM rooms WHERE del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT room_no , room_name , mem_id , mem_name , TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS reg_date , del_yn FROM rooms WHERE room_no = #{roomNo} AND del_yn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms ( room_no, room_name, mem_id, mem_name, reg_date, del_yn ) VALUES ( room_seq.NEXTVAL, #{roomName}, #{memId}, #{memName}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
